snippet: An elephant in the Ringling Brothers and Barnum & Bailey Circus was injured in a drive-by shooting on Tuesday, and the police were searching for suspects, law enforcement and circus officials said.
abstract: Police in Tupelo, Miss, are searching for suspects after elephant in Ringling Brothers and Barnum & Bailey Circus was injured during drive-by shooting.
lead_paragraph: An elephant in the Ringling Brothers and Barnum & Bailey Circus was injured in a drive-by shooting on Tuesday, and the police were searching for suspects, law enforcement and circus officials said.

headline.main: Mississippi: Elephant Is Victim of Drive-By Shooting
headline.print_headline: Mississippi: Elephant Is Victim of Drive-By Shooting
